name: 覇者の闘気
effects: Gain Regen (Champion) (10122) at the start of a battle
Increase LB gauge by 2 per turn

desc_short.1: 戰鬥中每回合自動恢復HPMP+增加極限技槽
desc_short.0: Restore HP and MP, and fill LB gauge every turn during battle
desc_short.2: 전투 중 매 턴마다 HP와 MP 회복+LB 게이지 증가
desc_short.5: Recupera VIT y PM y rellena la barra de LB cada turno
desc_short.4: Stellt alle LP und MP, Limitmeter steigt langsam.

desc_long.1: 戰鬥中每回合自動恢復HPMP並增加極限技槽。
desc_long.0: Recovers HP and MP each turn during battle, and fills the limit burst gauge.
desc_long.2: 전투 중 매 턴마다 HP와 MP를 회복하고, LB 게이지가 증가합니다.
desc_long.5: Recupera VIT y PM y rellena la barra de LB cada turno
desc_long.4: Stellt LP und MP bei jedem Zug wieder her, Limitmeter steigt langsam.
